resources.string: Error: Unable to load saved image

"New-Morph is an image deformation tool. You can reshape the contour to reshape the objects on the image, keeping the area nearby unchanged. The contour can either be generated automatically or be drawn„ÄÅerased and fixed by yourself.
We suggest you get the contour by system firstly, then fix the contour using the tools we provide. The small flaws on the contour will be fixed by system automatically. It may tack minutes to get the contour, but the result will be amazing.
After generate the deformed picture, please slide the sliders again to adjust the distinctness in the deformation area before you dismiss the morphing dialog.
We hope you enjoy using it. Have a problem? Have a question? We're here to help: "Email us.
Select lines to cut off the area reshaped,please select two endpoints of every cutting line
Then you can draw a line starts from the flag anywhere
Getting contour failed,please fix the contour
Long click to set whether to preferentially select edge point or not
Long click to set brush size
Select the start point of the contour
Select the end point of the contour
Select a drag point to drag
Click on the screen to relocate the drag point
Slide the sliders to reshape the contour
Slide the sliders again to adjust its distinctness
Shift to another contour to reshape,you only need to select a drag point, the endpoints keep unchanged
Click on the screen to select the start point of the line to be drawn
Select the end point of the contour
Select the start point of the contour
Select the start point of the cutting line
Select the end point of the cutting line
Slide the sliders to adjust the distinctness
Click on the screen again to reset
